review_title: Meaningful Work, Beautiful Place, Great People
job_title: Full Time Faculty in Saint Louis, MO
pros: Meaningful work that contributes to a worldwide Gospel mission, with eternal significance. Beautiful surroundings, 100-year old architecture, well-tended grounds. Fantastic community and sense of collegiate. Good salary and benefits plan.
cons: St Louis summers are great, but HOT and HUMID.

job_title: Food Bank Coordinator in Saint Louis, MO
pros:
Great staff and supervisors
Positive work atmosphere
cons:
Constant recruiting of volunteers and student workers
Low pay

review_title: Great place to study and work
job_title: Graduate Student in Saint Louis, MO
pros: Flexible and cares about their student employees
cons: Limits on number of hours a student can work per week

review_title: Great organization to work for.  Staff and managers tried to make it great work place.
job_title: Call Center Customer Service Representative in Saint Louis, MO
pros: Great working environment. Management really cares about employees.
cons: I can not think of any right now. Hours were limited. Maybe increase diversity when it comes to management and administration.

job_title: Welcome Center Representative in Saint Louis, MO
pros: The community is great, and the administration really works with you to help you succeed
cons: Nothing that I can think of.
